  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_82376</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_82376</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Signaux  micro-onde</string>
            <string language="en">Microwave signals</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mikrowelle Signale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sinais da microonda</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Segnali di microonda</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σήματα μικροκυμάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Señales de la microonda</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce graphique montre la quantité de bruit radiographique provenant de notre propre galaxie et l'atmosphère de la terre qui affectent des signaux à différentes longueurs d'onde.</string>
            <string language="en">This graph shows the amount of radio noise from our own galaxy and the Earth's atmosphere that affect signals at different wavelengths.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">La terre</string>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">galaxie</string>
            <string language="en">galaxy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">bruit</string>
            <string language="en">Noise</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">bruit par radio</string>
            <string language="en">radio noise</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">longueur d'onde</string>
            <string language="en">wavelength</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt die Menge der Funkstörung 
von unserer eigenen Galaxie und die Atmosphäre der Masse, die Signale
an den unterschiedlichen Wellenlängen beeinflussen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este gráfico mostram a quantidade do ruído de 
rádio de nossa própria galáxia e a atmosfera da terra que afetam 
sinais em wavelengths diferentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo grafico mostra la quantità di disturbo 
radiofonico dalla nostra propria galassia e l'atmosfera della terra 
che interessano i segnali alle lunghezze d'onda differenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η γραφική παράσταση εμφανίζει το ποσό ραδιο 
θορύβου από το γαλαξία μας και τη γήινη ατμόσφαιρα που έχουν 
επιπτώσεις στα σήματα στα διαφορετικά μήκη κύματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este gráfico muestra la cantidad de ruido de 
radio de nuestra propia galaxia y la atmósfera de la tierra que 
afectan señales en diversas longitudes de onda.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Galaxie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geräusche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Funkstörung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wellenlänge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">galáxia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ruído</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ruído de rádio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">wavelength</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Terra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">galassia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Disturbo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">disturbo radiofonico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lunghezza d'onda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γαλαξίας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θόρυβος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ραδιο θόρυβος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μήκος κύματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tierra</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">galaxia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ruido</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">ruido de radio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">longitud de onda</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
